add_a_tag_description: Add new tags to use as a filter in your App Launcher. Then, go to <0>Access > Applications</0> to apply them to related applications.
add_tags_to_app_description: Add tags to filter applications in the App Launcher. For best practice, we recommend a max of three tags per application.
description: Create tags and apply them to your Access applications. Then, use tags to filter and organize your App Launcher.

empty_state_action_create_tag_bp_1: Add new tags based on categories you choose.
empty_state_action_create_tag_bp_2: Tags have a maximum of 35 characters.

empty_state_recommendation_manage_app_la: Create rules to define who can access your App Launcher. App Launcher rules do not impact permissions for Access applications.
